Title: The Medallion
Writer: Alfred Cheung (story and original characters), Bennett Davlin, Alfred Cheung, Gordon Chan, Paul Wheeler, Bey Logan
Actors: Jackie Chan, Lee Evans, Claire Forlani, Julian Sands
Plot: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.
Production: Emperor Multimedia Group (EMG) [hk], Golden Port Productions Ltd. [hk]
